statements: SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_type, log_description FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_type IN ('Error', 'Warning') ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_type = 'Error';
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE log_description LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_type, log_description FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = '52685410-1b3a-437e-8883-b2d6dc277e0f' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING log_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY device_id, log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs
SELECT log_time, log_description FROM logs WHERE device_id = 123
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Phone' ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT log_id, log_time, log_type FROM logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices GROUP BY device_type HAVING total_devices > 1
SELECT log_id, log_time, device_id, log_type, log_description FROM logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE status = 'active' AND device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY last_connection ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_description FROM logs WHERE log_type IN ('warning', 'error') AND device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE status = 'active') ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE last_connection > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id ASC LIMIT 8;

SELECT log_id, log_time, device_id, log_type FROM logs WHERE log_description LIKE '%critical%' AND device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'server') ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 6;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, log_type FROM device_logs;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE device_id = 'abcdefg-123456';
SELECT * FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, log_type, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE log_type = 'error';
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp, log_type FROM device_logs WHERE log_type = 'warning' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_timestamp, incident_description, device_logs.log_message FROM security_incidents JOIN device_logs ON security_incidents.device_id = device_logs.device_id;

SELECT breach_id, breach_timestamp, device_logs.log_type, device_logs.log_message FROM security_breaches JOIN device_logs ON security_breaches.device_id = device_logs.device_id ORDER BY breach_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM breach_events WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT professional_id, name FROM professionals ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM security_incidents;
SELECT * FROM device_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM security_incidents WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY description ASC;

SELECT p.name, s.description, b.severity FROM professionals p JOIN security_incidents s ON p.professional_id = s.device_id JOIN breach_events b ON s.incident_id = b.incident_id WHERE b.severity > 5 ORDER BY p.name, s.description DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(severity) AS max_severity, MIN(severity) AS min_severity FROM breach_events;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY last_seen DESC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_timestamp FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_id > 100;
SELECT incident_id, note_timestamp, note_description FROM incident_notes WHERE note_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_type = 'Error' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, device_type, last_seen FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY last_seen ASC
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM breach_events LEFT JOIN security_incidents ON breach_events.incident_id = security_incidents.incident_id WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach'
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
